product_desc:
New patent applications per GDP $ in the U.S have increased only 2% per year in the last 20 years. The success rate of applications decreased substantially during the same period, particularly for applications in the “Computers and Communications” field with >90% rejected when initially filed. Furthermore, applications filed by small firms and startups are far less likely to emerge as patents than those filed by large firms.

We provide Data Analytic Tools that help hi-tech businesses identify, create and protect IP. Patent attorneys and agents utilize the tools to draft quality applications. Investors, incubators and M&A deal makers leverage our solution to evaluate risk/value of target business patent portfolio.

The founder is hi-tech industry veteran with numerous patents issued. Has created technologies that fundamentally changed the way computing is performed today. Steered Patent Committees at Fortune 500 firms.
high_concept: Help Businesses Create and Protect IP
name: Austin Analytics
